DOC.brief_summary: Survivorship Care Planning may improve overall well-being quality life colorectal lung cancer survivor
DOC.brief_title: Survivorship Care Planning Patients With Colorectal Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . To test feasibility acceptability Advanced Practice Nurse ( APN ) drive Survivorship Care Planning ( SCP ) intervention colorectal cancer ( CRC ) non-small cell lung cancer ( NSCLC ) survivor . SECONDARY OBJECTIVES : I . Development infrastructure strategy large comparative intervention study . OUTLINE : Patients undergo Survivorship Care Planning comprise disease surveillance , management potential long-term late effect , psycho-social-spiritual issue , healthy living recommendation .
DOC.criteria: Pathologically confirm diagnosis stage I , II , III CRC NSCLC Able read understand English Able read and/or understand study protocol requirement , provide write informed consent Diagnosis CRC NSCLC Within three month complete primary treatment ( surgery , chemotherapy , radiation , chemoradiation ) Without recurrent new primary cancer
